LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamMicrofibralMuscle.label: microfibral muscle
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamMicrofibralMuscle.descrip: Androids with this amalgam subroutine take less injuries than others from the same damage and feel half as much pain compared to a baseliner gene. They have extra-strong muscle fibers.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamArmoredSkeleton.label: armored skeleton
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamArmoredSkeleton.descripti: Androids with this amalgam subroutine are not slowed down when taking damage and do more damage in close-quarters combat. They have thickened, densified bones, nearly-solid ribcages, and strengthened binding factors in joints and flesh.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamTemperature.label: amalgam temperature-tolerant
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamTemperature.description: Androids with this amalgam subroutine are more comfortable in any temperatures. They have shielded temperature resistant skin layer.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamPlatingSkin.label: plating skin
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamPlatingSkin.description: Androids with this amalgam subroutine have armored skin and are resistant to blast damage. They have shielded plating skin layer.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamShieldedSkin.label: shielded skin
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamShieldedSkin.description: Androids with this amalgam subroutine are resistant to environmental toxins, toxic buildup, acid, cryo and flame damages from any sources. They have shielded flexible skin layer.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamHealingFactor.label: healing factor
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamHealingFactor.description: Androids with this amalgam subroutine gain immunity to diseases considerably faster than normal and heal from wounds four times as fast as normal.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamEyes.label: amalgam eyes
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamEyes.description: Amalgam eyes improve the carrier's sight capacity and improves accuracy.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamNervousSystem.label: amalgam nervous system
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamNervousSystem.description: Amalgam nervous system improve the carrier's consciousness capacity and improves negotiating abilities.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamFingers.label: amalgam fingers
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamFingers.description: Amalgam fingers improve the carrier's manipulation capacity. This aids with many tasks, especially crafting and construction.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamTail.label: amalgam tail
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamTail.description: Androids with this amalgam subroutine grow a tail that can act as a dexterous fifth limb.
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamGeneFlexibility.label: amalgam power flexibility
LanguageData.OE_VREA_AmalgamGeneFlexibility.descripti: Androids with this amalgam subroutine have special cellular structure that facilitate and optimize power systems. But increases the market value significantly.
